item.description:
Hey All,

Sorry for the long absence from meetup. Thanks to everyone else who has created some events while i've been taking a break from the group. I'm back for the fall concert season. I'm going to be heading to Harper's Ferry this Saturday for a great acoustic show - If you are a fan of The New Amsterdams or Matt's Solo work, this will be a great show. I really enjoy Kevin Devine as well, he puts more emotion into his live performances than I have seen for a solo act. Hope to see you at Harper's Ferry this Saturday at 8:30. Give me a call if you want to meetup. 701-331-0920

Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a call if you want to meetup
item.name: Matt Pryor (New Amsterdams/Get Up Kids) With Kevin Devin - Sat, September 6th
